channel.title: VIDA Dataset Search and Discovery Seminar Series
channel.description: Recent content on VIDA Dataset Search and Discovery Seminar Series

item.title: Spring 2023
item.description: About The VIDA Dataset Search and Discovery seminar covers recent research in the dataset discovery area. The seminar is organized by the Visualization, Imaging, and Data Analysis Group at New York University. Schedule Date Speaker Talk Location 2/15 11am Aécio Santos, New York University Sketching Methods for Efficient Correlated Dataset Search [Details] 370 Jay Street, room 1201 3/01 11am Natasha Noy, Google Research Google Dataset Search: Building an open ecosystem for dataset discovery [Details] 3/17 11am Raul Castro Fernandez, University of Chicago TBD [Details] 3/24 11am Fatemeh Nargesian, University of Rochester TBD [Details] Talk Details Talk by Aécio Santos Abstract Dataset search is emerging as a critical capability in both research and industry: it has spurred many novel applications such as data augmentation for enriching data analyses and improving machine learning models.
